data.name: DateTime
desc: specifies service of a date or time text field.

properties.name: Adjust
desc: contains an offset to the date or time value in minutes.

properties.name: DateTimeFormat
desc: this is the display format for this field.
Depending on IsDate, this is either a com.sun.star.text.DateDisplayFormat or com.sun.star.text.TimeDisplayFormat.
This property is deprecated and is here only for components that do not support a com.sun.star.util.NumberFormatter.

properties.name: DateTimeValue
desc: the is the content of this field.

properties.name: IsDate
desc: If this flag is set to TRUE this field represents a date with an optional time.
If it is set to FALSE only the time is used here.

properties.name: IsFixed
desc: If this flag is set to FALSE the date or time is always displayed as the current date or time.

properties.name: IsFixedLanguage
desc: determines whether changes in language attributes at the position the text field is located also change the number format as appropriate for this language.

properties.name: NumberFormat
desc: this is the number format for this field
